name: MOONSHOT (itch) (alott, gogogoose)
description:
Leap through space and TOUCH THE STARS! Bring them back to your home planet for safekeeping! Compete with friends in this local multiplayer collectathon, press Jump to join!

Instructions:

Player 1

Jump: Up arrow

Move Left/Right: Left/Right arrows

Jostle in mid-air: Down arrow

Player 2

Jump: W

Move Left/Right: A/D

Jostle in mid-air: S

Player 3

Jump: Space

Move Left/Right: B/N

Jostle in mid-air: V

Tip: If you get caught at a Lagrange point, try jostling to escape!
